rules.name: maxEventRadius
rules.description: max radius around the player where block events will be stepped over

rules.name: printEventCoords
rules.description: prints the coordinates of events when stepping over a single event

rules.name: skipInvalidEvents
rules.description: skip stepping over events executed on the wrong block

rules.name: vanillaPistonAnimations
rules.description: tells carpet clients the game isn't frozen, allowing piston animations to play immediately
